tavern.description: The Stumbling Pig tavern. Warm firelight, smell of stew, murmur of conversation.

cellar.description: Dusty wine cellar. Barrels line the walls. A cold draft comes from somewhere.

street.description: The main village street. Cobblestones worn smooth by generations of feet.

market.description: The market square. Empty stalls wait for the weekly market day.

blacksmith.description: Tobias's forge. The heat hits you like a wall. Metal rings on metal.

temple.description: A small stone temple to the harvest goddess. Candles flicker within.

village_gate.description: The north gate. A wooden palisade with a guard tower. Beyond lies the road.

forest_path.description: A dirt path into Darkwood Forest. The trees grow thick and dark ahead.
